comments_since_last_sample.body: I am not as such addicted to masterbation.. But yeah..I have never stopped doing it.. Like once in 3 days. 5 days and so on.. But I know my mind and body will be lot better without it... But I am unable to stop it. So from this podcast I will use the tips given by Ranveer .. Like putting that addiction on something productive... So I have decided that from tomorrow onwards I will spend that energy on meditation and workout..I hope I will be successful
